If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a basket. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best? What a letdown! The basket is empty!  There is a closed hatch leading north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.
